title: Reporting
body: Some guy that played with me added me after the game and just flat out abused me and there is nothing i can do about it but react. So you need a reporting system in general not just after a game. Or this will keep going and people will lose interest in the game.

replies.body: why add him after the game? or jsut block him, there are those two things, you could have muted him in game. do what everyone else does, suck it up.
Take a screenshot of it all and send a support ticket.
